About bloomon:

Bloomon is a successful start-up, disrupting the international flower industry. The flower sector generates over â‚¬50 billion in annual turnover, whereby 50-60% is traded via the Netherlands. 99% of the sector still operates offline. Bloomon will drive the shift online.
